front.title: Dynamic Port Range Re-Assignments for Address Sharing

abstract.t: This document proposes an extension regarding dynamic port range re- assignment to an IPv4 address sharing framework (SHARA), to overcome IPv4 address shortage. It allows an entity which is responsible for IPv4 address and port distribution to apply dynamic handling of already assigned port ranges. An adjustment of number of ports per customer according to the current consumption pattern is possible with this enhancement.
